commands: rsync -avz --progress -e 'ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null' /tmp/summit-backup.tar.gz ubuntu@172.31.49.125:/tmp/ 2>&1 || echo 'Transfer failed - trying scp...' && scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null /tmp/summit-backup.tar.gz ubuntu@172.31.49.125:/tmp/ 2>&1
